teacher_info.teaching_style:
As I previously mentioned, I always adapt to the needs of my students. If you want to focus on just passing an exam, we will make our strategies together to achieve that goal. If you want to study for an international language test, we will focus on hacking the test and essential tips to get a better grade.
And I know that learning a language is not just about passing an exam, that's why we can have conversational classes, during which we just choose an interesting topic and talk about it during class and I will not interrupt you, so you can improve your fluency and at the end of the class I will show you some sentences which you said and we will work on getting rid of some common mistakes.

pro_course_detail.description:

We will work on improving pronunciation and mastering grammar. Not sure of your proficiency in Spanish? We will assess your level with a test to find the appropriate starting point. Additionally, I will offer useful resources to aid you in your language-learning journey.

Bu dilin inceliklerini yavaş yavaş birlikte keşfedeceğiz. Dinleme, konuşma, yazma ve okuma da dahil olmak üzere konunun tüm yönlerini anlamanıza yardımcı olacağım. Telaffuzu geliştirmeye ve dilbilgisine hakim olmaya çalışacağız. İspanyolca yeterliliğinizden emin değil misiniz? Uygun başlangıç ​​noktasını bulmak için seviyenizi bir testle değerlendireceğiz. Ayrıca dil öğrenme yolculuğunuzda size yardımcı olacak faydalı kaynaklar da sunacağım.

pro_course_detail.description:

Each lesson will focus on a theme selected by you, sparking discussions to improve your Spanish abilities. I will also help you broaden your vocabulary and enhance your pronunciation. Her ders sizin tarafınızdan seçilen bir konuya odaklanacak ve İspanyolca becerilerinizi geliştirmenize yönelik sohbetlere yol açacaktır. Ayrıca kelime dağarcığınızı genişletmenize ve telaffuzunuzu geliştirmenize yardımcı olacağım. Gerekirse dilbilgisi kavramlarını birlikte gözden geçireceğiz.

pro_course_detail.title: Español para viajeros (tourism) ✈️
pro_course_detail.description:
We will concentrate on various scenarios you may encounter while traveling to a country where Spanish is spoken. For example:
How to place an order at a restaurant, or shopping, request directions, typical phrases when seeking assistance, reserve a hotel room, navigate the airport, general information about the location, describe individuals and locations, visit the doctor, discussing past events.

teacher_info.intro:
I specialize in helping people to sound as professional as possible…fast: fluencyspace.com

For nearly 12 years, I have helped hundreds of professionals to improve their confidence in Business English.

I am an experienced, passionate linguist with a clear accent and a patient, friendly, motivating personality.

I have taught professionals from across the world including company owners, CEOs, CFOs, as well as professionals in marketing, sales, HR, IT and finance.

My main focus is to improve your career opportunities through Business English, striving to tailor my lessons and courses to your specific goals and needs.
teacher_info.short_signature: I have taught Business English for 12 years.  I look forward to helping you to further your career!
teacher_info.introduction:
Do you need to take your business English to the next level? 
Are you preparing for an important interview or presentation?
Do you want to sound more professional and improve your career opportunities? 

I have been teaching English to professionals like yourself for 6 years as my full time job, helping them with problems like those listed above. 

In our lessons we will focus specifically on your own PERSONAL GOALS, using a range of materials to suit your particular learning style - just as I did with Jakub... 'When I started lessons 3 years ago I set David a challenge. I wanted him to make my lessons dependent on my skills and how my skills will grow. He adapts his style to my needs, and I feel much more confident with my English in present days.' Jakub Jedlicka, Managing Director, Casablanca Inc. 

In order to focus on your needs, I will give you a comprehensive assessment of your level during the trial lesson, so that I can tell you exactly where you are with your Business English, and the areas that we can improve to take it to the next level. Then we will discuss you own personal aims with English, which I will use to make a course just for you. I also make sure we cover all core business topics, themes for discussion and important areas of business vocabulary. 

I have a full Oxford TEFL certification and I have taught hundreds of students from all over the world since 2011. I hope I can use my experience to help you. 

I look forward to meeting you so that we can set some specific goals to take your business English forward! 

'David’s lessons provide everything for my personal improvement. We are not rigidly linked to one specific textbook or topic, and that’s great for me. I enjoy lessons, David is the best teacher I ever had' - Martin Nosek, HR Manager.

Cancellation Policy - Lessons cancelled within 24 hours of the scheduled time will be charged at the full rate.  For students with packages, students will be refunded 1 late cancellation every 6 months.

pro_course_detail.title: Advanced Business English Standard Course
pro_course_detail.description:
Welcome to my Advanced Business English Course!   As an experienced online teacher, I offer a detailed course will boost your Business English and improve your career opportunities. 

Are you going to start in a new job position which will involve speaking to clients and colleagues in English?

Is your company going international, requiring you to participate in conference calls and meetings in English?

If so, I can help you to level up your Business English fast.  With my experience, I have developed a large database of the vocabulary and grammar that you need to boost your Business English as quickly as possible.  I call this the Fluency Space Academy, and
everyone who books a package with me will have full access to over 600 downloadable materials in my academy.  I offer samples of all these materials to those who book a trial lesson. 

Before we even begin lessons, I will be able to give you a detailed level evaluation in our demo lesson, which will also give us an opportunity to asses YOUR OWN PERSONAL GOALS.  Based on these goals, I compile special modules according to your needs.

We will also focus on core business discussion themes as well as conversation to improve your confidence in speaking!

If you are interested in assessing your goals together, and taking your Business English to advanced level and beyond, book a trial lesson and we'll have a chat.  Even if you decide not to take lessons, you will still obtain a full evaluation of your business English level, loads of free materials and a clearer idea of where you want to take your Business English!

 - Assessment of where you are in your career and where you want to be

- For Students who Complete these Steps, Receive 1000 pages of Business English

pro_course_detail.title: Advanced Business English Premium Course
pro_course_detail.description:
This is my flagship program to help you learn English as quickly as possible, and is meant for those who need to see results immediately.

These are more intense than regular English lessons -- there will be work for you to do on your own *every day* and you will be expected to do it. I can promise you that if you do your part, you will improve faster than you ever thought possible.

In addition to the sessions, you will also have free and exclusive access to 24/7 self-study materials that you will be able to use anytime, anywhere. I will track your progress and each lesson will be targeted to reduce errors and improve communication. 

If you need to see specific results right now, then this may be the program for you.

 My lessons contain a variety of materials and resources including:

Thank you!

course_info.trial_description:
Welcome to our introductory session, where we embark on the journey of teacher and student. This is an opportunity for us to get to know each other better and discuss our goals for this learning experience. I am eager to learn about your aspirations and understand how we can work together to achieve them.

Allow me to share some insights about myself as an educator. I am passionate about teaching and dedicated to creating an engaging and supportive learning environment. My primary aim is to help you grasp the subject matter while fostering critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
As for the structure of our lessons, they will be designed to be interactive and dynamic. We will explore various teaching methods to cater to your unique learning style. Expect a mix of discussions, exercises, and practical applications to enhance your understanding and retention.

I am looking forward to meeting you soon and commencing this enriching learning journey together! Should you have any questions or concerns before we begin, feel free to reach out. Let's make the most of our time together and achieve great success!

pro_course_detail.title: Everyday English: Learn to Speak and Communicate with Confidence and Ease
pro_course_detail.description:
As your language instructor, my primary focus is to help you build a strong foundation in English, enabling you to confidently communicate in everyday situations. Whether you are a beginner eager to start your language journey or someone looking to brush up on essential language skills, I am here to support and guide you every step of the way.

Grammar: Understanding the rules and structure of English grammar is vital for effective communication. Through interactive lessons and practical exercises, we will delve into the nuances of grammar, ensuring you grasp concepts with ease and accuracy.

Pronunciation: Clear and accurate pronunciation is key to making yourself understood. We will work on improving your pronunciation through various exercises, intonation practice, and real-life conversations to help you sound more natural and confident.

Conversational Skills: Engaging in conversations is the essence of language learning. I will encourage and facilitate conversations on diverse topics, providing you with ample opportunities to practice speaking, listening, and expressing yourself fluently.

Interview Preparation: Excelling in interviews requires a combination of language proficiency and confidence. I will equip you with the language and communication skills needed to make a positive impression during interviews and professional interactions.

Reading and Writing: Developing your reading and writing abilities is essential for personal and professional growth. Together, we will explore interesting texts, expand your vocabulary, and work on expressing your thoughts coherently in writing.

Moreover, our lessons will be tailored to your specific learning style and goals, ensuring that you get the most out of each session. I am committed to creating a supportive and encouraging learning environment where you can feel comfortable making mistakes and learning from them.

With a wealth of resources at our disposal, including interactive materials, language exercises

pro_course_detail.title: Grammar Rules: Let's Nail English Grammar Together!
pro_course_detail.description: Hey there! Ready to dive into the exciting world of English grammar? Join me in the Grammar Rules course, where we'll unravel the mysteries of grammar in a fun and engaging way. We'll tackle everything from tricky tenses to pesky punctuation, all while sharing a few laughs along the way. Expect interactive lessons and activities to make learning grammar a breeze. Whether you're just starting out or looking to brush up on your skills, we've got you covered. Let's make grammar your new best friend and boost your confidence in speaking and writing. Ready to rock the English language? Let's do this! 🚀

pro_course_detail.title: Excel in IELTS: Your Personalized ESL Lesson for Exam Triumph
pro_course_detail.description: Embark on a dynamic ESL journey with me as your dedicated tutor, tailor-made to equip you for triumph in the IELTS exam. With my proven expertise and hands-on teaching approach, we'll unravel the nuances of the IELTS exam, focusing on honing your listening, reading, writing, and speaking abilities. Together, we'll delve into crucial strategies, enrich your vocabulary, refine grammar intricacies, and engage in authentic practice sessions mirroring actual exam scenarios. Immerse yourself in a personalized learning experience designed to enhance your confidence and optimize your IELTS performance.

teacher_info.intro: Greetings! I'm Ismail! I was born in Geneva, Switzerland, and grew up in New York City from elementary until high school; and subsequently relocated to Australia to pursue my Bachelor's in Canberra and Master's in Sydney. I speak both English and Indonesian as my mother tongue. I have extensive work experience in media and communications, public relations, information technology, as well as international organizations.  I’d like to think of myself as an expressive and communicative person – who loves to talk about anything related to traveling, history, technology, politics, movies, pop culture and much more.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
English is such an expressive language, and as the global ‘lingua franca’, I believe everyone has something to gain in learning and mastering the English language.  

In high school, I was in English honors, and as silly as it sounds - I consider that one of my crowning achievements in life.  

As a person, I am generally very liberal and open-minded in my worldview perspective. I am also patient, and above all love to learn about new topics across many fields. 

I also have extensive experience in proofreading and revising English writing, from university essays to work proposals.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My teaching method is all about flexibility and adaptability.  

My goal is to make you feel at ease, comfortable and above all relaxed in our conversational space. Ultimately, I aim to boost your confidence level and proficiency in English – be it conversationally in social settings among friends and family, public speaking or even in your career among peers and colleagues!

I am always open to suggestions - for instance, if you wish to analyze and discuss passages, news articles or even academic papers, we can definitely do that.

Additionally, I will provide corrections to certain words, phrases or sentences for your improvement. Let's have a chat and talk about the world! See you!

teacher_info.teaching_style:
My teaching style is very interactive and I offer three types of lessons; conversational lessons, general English lessons, and interview practice.

In my conversational lessons, I come up with topics or I send articles to students for discussion. During our discussion, I will be noting any errors in your speech and I will provide feedback and some resources to help you improve those areas.

In my general English lessons, I teach grammar, vocabulary and pronunciation in the form of a normal structured tutorial including practice activities.

In my interview practice lessons, we will go over common interview questions and some industry-specific questions for the job you are applying for.

Khóa học tập trung vào việc phát triển kỹ năng giao tiếp của bạn trong nhiều ngữ cảnh khác nhau, bao gồm giao tiếp xã hội, bày tỏ ý kiến ​​và đàm phán. Bạn sẽ học cách thể hiện bản thân trôi chảy và chính xác hơn, đặc biệt tập trung vào việc cải thiện kỹ năng nghe và nói của bạn. Ngoài ra, bạn sẽ thực hành kỹ năng đọc và viết thông qua nhiều hoạt động và bài tập hấp dẫn. Kết thúc khóa học này, bạn sẽ cảm thấy tự tin và thoải mái hơn khi giao tiếp bằng tiếng Anh trong nhiều tình huống khác nhau.

This B1-B2 English course is designed for intermediate-level students who already have a good grasp of English grammar and vocabulary. The course focuses on developing your communication skills in a variety of contexts, including socializing, expressing opinions, and negotiating. You'll learn to express yourself more fluently and accurately, with a particular focus on improving your listening and speaking skills. In addition, you'll practice reading and writing skills through a variety of engaging activities and exercises. By the end of this course, you'll feel more confident and comfortable communicating in English in a variety of situations.
*I gladly accept rescheduling requests within 24 hours of the scheduled lesson time, allowing a maximum of 1 reschedule per month. However, once the lesson has commenced, rescheduling requests will not be accommodated. Thank you for your understanding :)

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English(A2-C2)
pro_course_detail.description:
This  conversational practice course is designed for learners who want to improve their ability to speak and listen in English. The course will focus on developing fluency and confidence through a variety of interactive activities and exercises, such as role-plays, discussions, and debates. Learners will engage in authentic conversations on a range of topics, including daily routines, personal interests, and cultural traditions. By the end of the course, learners will have developed their conversational skills and be able to communicate more effectively in English in real-life situations.

*I gladly accept rescheduling requests within 24 hours of the scheduled lesson time, allowing a maximum of 1 reschedule per month. However, once the lesson has commenced, rescheduling requests will not be accommodated. Thank you for your understanding :)

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, привет, вітаю!

ЕСЛИ ВЫ ИЗУЧАЕТЕ АНГЛИЙСКИЙ / ЯКЩО ВИВЧАЄТЕ АНГЛІЙСЬКУ...
Вместе мы сделаем изучение английского легким и увлекательным процессом. Я говорю на русском и украинском.. тому ми легко зможемо спілкуватись та подолати мовленевий бар'єр.

IF YOU STUDY UKRAINIAN...
With a background in journalism and experience living in both Russian and Ukrainian-speaking regions of Ukraine, I bring a unique perspective to our lessons.

IF YOU STUDY RUSSIAN...
My love for the Russian language extends to its captivating literature. This passion infuses my teaching approach, as I believe that understanding a language's culture and literature adds a layer of richness to the learning experience.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
С детства я ощущала неподдельную страсть к английскому языку, и в 18 лет решила делиться этой страстью с другими. Моя история началась с репетиторства для детей, но вскоре я осознала, что педагогика - это именно мой путь. Зараз у мене налічується значний досвід роботи зі студентами різного віку, від 5 до 75 років, з різним рівнем знань.

My journey started with students who spoke no Russian, Ukrainian, or English. To bridge the language gap, I turned to engaging games and vivid visuals. Currently based in Slovakia, I've added Slovak to my toolkit for even more effective communication. Whether you're a curious child or an adult eager to explore Ukrainian or Russian, I'm here to guide you.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Let's talk! Давайте разговаривать! Давайте розмовляти! 

Використовую комунікативні методики (розмова на різні теми, role-plays - розіграш певних ситуацій тощо) для подолання мовного бар'єру. 

We'll read and discuss some topics due to your level and interests. Do you like philosophy? Literature? Art? No problem! We'll discuss it.

Для збільшення словникового запасу використовую підручники загального типу, які підбираю під кожного учня індивідуально.  

При смешанном уровне (например, между Elementary и Pre-Intermediate) делаю комбинацию из нескольких учебников.

We'll learn some new words and work with them in games, videos, games - whatever can help you to remember them for ages!

course_info.trial_description: Hi there! We're going to meet each other and have a chat about your hobbies and interests. We're going to discuss the journey of our studying the language and the goals we want to achieve. Привет! На пробном уроке мы познакомимся и поболтаем о ваших хобби и интересах. Мы также обсудим наш путь обучения языка и цели, которые будем преследовать.

pro_course_detail.title: РУССКИЙ: говорение В1-С2
pro_course_detail.description: На этом уроке мы будем обсуждать интересующие вас темы о жизни и быте. Мы обязательно прочтем небольшой текст, который сможем обговорить. На уроке будут использоваться электронные материалы (книги, справочники), картинки, видео и все то, о чем будет идти речь во время обсуждения.

pro_course_detail.title: РУССКИЙ: от азов до продвинутого А0-С1
pro_course_detail.description: На этом уроке мы будем записывать правила правописания, тренироваться в написании слов и предложений. Мы обязательно проведем небольшой тест, который покажет, над чем нужно поработать дома. На уроке будут использоваться электронные материалы совместного доступа, аудиозаписи, картинки и игры для повторения изученной темы.

pro_course_detail.title: ENGLISH А2-C2 Speaking
pro_course_detail.description: In this lesson, we will discuss some interesting topics about anything you like. We will read some short texts that we can discuss or listen to the podcasts and songs due to the topic of the lesson. There will be online games, books, and other media files that can inspire us to discussion.

pro_course_detail.title: ENGLISH A0-C1 All Inclusive (Grammar, Listening, Reading, Speaking)
pro_course_detail.description: In this lesson, we will learn some new rules for you and repeat them during the reading of the texts. We can also listen to some podcasts or music videos to improve your knowledge. There will be online games, books, and other media files that can help us to study better!

pro_course_detail.title: ENGLISH for children and teenagers (5-14 years old)
pro_course_detail.description:
Let's have fun together and study English together! For young learners, I provide games and interesting books full of adventurous stories. We learn grammar through the videos with funny hamsters and games like whack-a-mole or spin the wheel. We can also listen to the songs as it is the best way to remember the words and rules. 

Давайте вместе веселиться и изучать английский язык! Для начальной школы я предлагаю игры и интересные книги, полные приключений и забавных историй. Мы изучаем грамматику с помощью видеороликов со смешными хомячками и играми, такими как «попади по кроту» или «колесо фортуны». Мы также можем слушать и учить песни, так как это лучший способ запомнить слова и правила.

pro_course_detail.title: УКРАЇНСЬКА: поговоримо? (А2-С2)
pro_course_detail.description: На цьому уроці ми будемо обговорювати цікаві для вас теми про життя і побут. Ми обов'язково прочитаємо невеликий текст, який зможемо обговорити. На уроці будуть використовуватись електронні матеріали (книги, довідники), картинки, відео

pro_course_detail.title: УКРАЇНСЬКА: from beginners to advanced (А0-С2)
pro_course_detail.description: На цьому уроці ми будемо записувати правила правопису, тренуватись у написанні слів та речень. Ми обов'язково проведемо невеликий тест, який покаже, над чим потрібно попрацювати вдома. На уроці будуть використовуватись електронні матеріали спільного доступу, аудіозаписи, картинки та ігри для повторення вивченої теми.
